full_summary:
Title
-----------

EZ897-250153 Remedial Excavation Program - Phase 1 Invitation to Qualify

Reference Number
---------------

WS4647306624-Doc4681530209

### Invitation to Qualify

The Department of Public Services and Government Procurement Canada, on behalf of Environment and Climate Change Canada, invites bidders to submit qualifications for the remedial excavation program at the Pacific Environment Centre in West Vancouver.

### Background

The Pacific Environment Centre is a government-owned facility in need of remedial excavation services to restore the site to a safe and environmentally friendly state. The project is divided into two phases. Phase 1 is an Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) where the qualifications of bidders will be evaluated. Phase 2 will be an open bidding competition where qualified bidders will be invited to submit a financial bid based on the project specifications and drawings.

### Notice Details

*   **Publication Date**: July 11, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: August 2, 2024, 2:00 PM Eastern Time
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: August 30, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: None

### Bidder Requirements

Bidders must be qualified and experienced in remedial excavation services. They must also be able to demonstrate their ability to implement the Indigenous Participation Requirement and comply with environmental regulations.

### Bid Submission

To participate in the Invitation to Qualify, bidders must submit a completed bid package that includes a cover letter, company profile, experience and qualifications, and financial information. The bid package must be received by August 2, 2024, by 2:00 PM Eastern Time.

### Contact Information

For questions or concerns, please contact Clara Dumay (SPAC/PSPC), at [clara.dumay@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:clara.dumay@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

### Additional Information

The invitation to qualify and bid package can be found on the Canadian Government's Tendering and Contracting Portal at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20295399?extsite=MjAyOTUzOTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20295399?extsite=MjAyOTUzOTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
